definition: trumpet/small size (clothes etc)/(coll.) number one/to urinate/(humble) our store
small/tiny/few/young
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
roar/cry/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Instead he handed me three small steel traps.
sentences.chinese: 但他遞給我的是三個小號捕獸夾。

sentences.english: Also, for down times when there are no alliance ops whatsoever just use your alts for making some cash.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，當沒有會戰的時候，用你的小號掙錢。

sentences.english: Dress sizes range from petite to extra large.
sentences.chinese: 服裝尺碼從特小號到特大號不等。

sentences.english: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentences.chinese: 他的小號演奏獨創一格。

sentences.english: If you have a bunch of alts and stuff leave an alt behind.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有很多小號和東西，最好留一個在後方。

sentences.english: The model was made by Trumpeter from Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 模型是由中國大陸的小號手出產。

sentences.english: I play trumpet in the school band.
sentences.chinese: 我在學校樂隊裏吹小號。

sentences.english: Daming gis playing the trumpet again, but the dog is singing very badly.
sentences.chinese: 大明再次演湊小號，這是小狗大聲的叫了起來。

sentences.english: The trumpets blared as the procession got under way.
sentences.chinese: 當隊伍開始前進時小號發出刺耳的響聲。

sentences.english: I was a trumpet player in the jazz band at school.
sentences.chinese: 在學校時我是爵士樂隊的小號手。

sentences.english: In this style of music , the trumpet , clarinet , and trombone form the basis of instrumentation.
sentences.chinese: 這種新樂風演奏的基本樂器包括小號，黑管和長號。

sentences.english: I wear medium, but there are only small and larges available.
sentences.chinese: 我穿中號的，但是這裏只有小號和大號。

sentences.english: Yet some exercises about lip vibration and embouchures blowing are the warm- up hare playing the trumpet.
sentences.chinese: 脣振和號嘴練習是正確吹奏小號的準備活動。

sentences.english: In real life, a swan doesn't blow a trumpet.
sentences.chinese: 在真實世界裏，天鵝更不會吹小號。

sentences.english: I'm awfully sorry, I only have a small size proof.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我只有小號的樣稿。

sentences.english: Suddenly, they heard someone playing trumpet.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，他們聽見有人在吹小號。
